value.title: Waymo says its self-driving cars are safer than human drivers by up to 10x
value.excerpt: Waymo claims its self-driving cars are 57% less likely to be in a crash and 85% less likely to injure anyone – or 90% less likely in SF.

value.title: Nitin Gadkari Takes A Firm Stand Against Autonomous Vehicles & Tesla Imports
value.excerpt: Nitin Gadkari strongly opposes the introduction of autonomous cars in India, citing potential job losses for around 80 lakh drivers when questioned about the introduction of driverless vehicles to reduce road accidents in India.

value.title: Tesla's AI Revolution: Morgan Stanley Predicts Explosive Growth
value.excerpt: Executives at Tesla TSLA +4.9% Inc. (TSLA) revealed last week new upgrades to Optimus, the firm’s bipedal robot. Morgan Stanley MS +0.6% researchers believe a Cambrian Explosion is near, leading to explosive growth for Tesla.

value.title: Tesla's recall of 2 million vehicles reminds us how far driverless car AI still has to go
value.excerpt: Tesla has recalled 2 million US vehicles over concerns about its autopilot function. Autopilot is meant to help with manoeuvres such as steering and acceleration, but still needs input from the driver.

value.title: Tesla Stock: How AI and Robotics May Change the Game

value.title: Tesla unveils its latest humanoid robot, Optimus Gen 2, in demo video
value.excerpt: On Tuesday, Tesla released a demo video showing the latest version of its prototype humanoid robot, Optimus Gen 2. Over one year after Tesla's first public Optimus robot demonstration, which showcased shaky robots that waved and slumped over, things have apparently progressed quite a bit, assuming that the video accurately reflects the technology.

value.title: Virginia sheriff says Tesla Autopilot was running before driving under tractor-trailer
value.excerpt: Virginia authorities have determined that a Tesla was operating on its Autopilot system and was speeding in the moments leading to a crash with a crossing tractor-trailer last July that killed the Tesla driver.
